activities: Organization does not use this personal information other than for executing customers' own business trips. Personal information stays secured inside the application that resides in a 'cloud' for customers to use it for their business jet trip planning. Customers forward some of the personal information to their choice of vendors or service providers to fulfill their service requests.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization name, address, contact information. Employees or members or affiliates of the organization that are included as passengers or crew for their business trips.
privacyprograms: None. Organization uses a cloud service provider, Salesforce.com, that has strict data privacy and security guidelines. Trans-Tech does not store any personal data on its own servers.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
